Class ImageContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.woact.mikand.ticTacToe.models.game.ImageContainer

extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Anders Mikkelsen on 09.02.15. VO for each square of the game board.
    Version:
    18.02.15
    Author:
    anders

      ImageContainer(android.widget.ImageView image, android.content.Context context)
